title: [Large-Scale] Pre-Service Teacher Competency Development Program Using Chatbot-Based 5E Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational educational theories and instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: A real-time interactive learning environment using mobile devices, providing immediate feedback through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can apply the 5E Model (Engage-Explore-Explain-Elaborate-Evaluate) to develop language instruction design documents
Learners can resolve over 80% of gaps in instructional design theory through interactions with a chatbot
Participants can perform self-directed learning at least five times per week using microlearning content in mobile environments

resources: Instructional Design Templates and Sample Materials

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
